mapper.insert: insert into CLIMATE_RECORD (ID, COPY_MAN, PROOF_MAN, FIRST_CALC_MAN, LAST_CALC_MAN, FIRST_CHECK_MAN, LAST_CHECK_MAN, PRINT_MAN, TEMPERATURE_MONITOR, RAIN_MONITOR, WET_MONITOR, RECORD_TYPE, TEMPERATURE_UNIT, RAIN_UNIT, WET_UNIT, MONITOR_TIME_START, MONITOR_TIME_END, SECTION_ID, RECORD_CODE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{copyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proofMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstCalcMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastCalcMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstCheckMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastCheckMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{printMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temperatureMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{rainMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{wetMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{recordType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temperatureUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rainUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wetUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monitorTimeStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{monitorTimeEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update CLIMATE_RECORD set COPY_MAN = #{copyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROOF_MAN = #{proofMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIRST_CALC_MAN = #{firstCalcMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_CALC_MAN = #{lastCalcMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIRST_CHECK_MAN = #{firstCheckMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_CHECK_MAN = #{lastCheckMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRINT_MAN = #{printMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMPERATURE_MONITOR = #{temperatureMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, RAIN_MONITOR = #{rainMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, WET_MONITOR = #{wetMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, RECORD_TYPE = #{recordType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMPERATURE_UNIT = #{temperatureUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RAIN_UNIT = #{rainUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WET_UNIT = #{wetUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONITOR_TIME_START = #{monitorTimeStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MONITOR_TIME_END = #{monitorTimeEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SECTION_ID = #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECORD_CODE = #{recordCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, COPY_MAN, PROOF_MAN, FIRST_CALC_MAN, LAST_CALC_MAN, FIRST_CHECK_MAN, LAST_CHECK_MAN, PRINT_MAN, TEMPERATURE_MONITOR, RAIN_MONITOR, WET_MONITOR, RECORD_TYPE, TEMPERATURE_UNIT, RAIN_UNIT, WET_UNIT, MONITOR_TIME_START, MONITOR_TIME_END, SECTION_ID, RECORD_CODE from CLIMATE_RECORD where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
